name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Kubernetes** to build and maintain high-performance, scalable solutions. My technical proficiency includes **Terraform**, **Pulumi**, **Helm**, **GitHub Actions**, and **Argocd**, ensuring seamless CI/CD workflows and robust infrastructure management. I have a deep understanding of **Service Mesh** technologies like **Envoy** and monitoring frameworks such as **Grafana** and **OpenTelemetry**. 
Alongside my expertise in **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **Go**, I have successfully developed enterprise-grade solutions across healthcare and financial sectors, integrating AI/ML capabilities for real-time data processing and intelligent automation. With a solid foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I ensure compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while consistently delivering secure and reliable applications.
